comments.body: Check the `rc` of this command to make sure it was good before parsing. You should probably do this on the previous commands as well.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +263,267 @@                # https://github.com/ansible/ansible/issues/50871
                args = [ip_path, 'addr', 'show', device]
                rc, data, stderr = self.module.run_command(args, errors='surrogate_then_replace')
                if rc == 0:
                    parse_ip_output(data)
